title: Music & Battle Cat & Shop & Cloud Fix
message:
Music & Battle Cat & Shop & Cloud Fix

+ Title sequence music
+ Character select music
+ Battle Cat character
+ If you select a locked character shop button replaces play button (for
future character purchasing)
~ Game music
~ Fixed clouds from randomly disappearing & made more efficient

title: Adjusted Sound Settings
message:
Adjusted Sound Settings

~ Sound effect is lower as it sounds better with the music

title: Added Rob, Xorp & Added Music
message:
Added Rob, Xorp & Added Music

+ Added Rob
+ Added Xorp
+ Added music that plays during the game screen and pauses when paused /
on other screen

title: Added Ash
message:
Added Ash

+ Added new character Ash

title: Unlock Message Fix
message:
Unlock Message Fix

~ Game over screen no longer appears when unlock message displayed

title: Completed Character Selection
message:
Completed Character Selection

+ Characters are unlocked by scoring a certain high score
+ Locked characters in the character select menu are shaded out and have
their unlock requirements written beneath their name
+ You are notified when you unlock a character (needs fixing to
completely set the game over screen invisible while the notification
displays)

title: Fixed Scrolling
message:
Fixed Scrolling

~ Fixed issue with scrolling where on mobile since there is no mouse to
move, it would not detect change in x2

title: Changed Character Screen Spacing
message:
Changed Character Screen Spacing

~ Changed spacing of podiums on character select screen

title: Finished Scrolling
message:
Finished Scrolling

~ Scrolling completed, with boundaries

title: Working on Scrolling
message:
Working on Scrolling

+ Improved the scrolling system, nearly there
- Removed Dropbox conflicting copies

title: Started Character Select Scrolling
message:
Started Character Select Scrolling

+ Started character select scrolling (needs planning out and
reattempting)
~ Improved efficiency of setting podium selection

title: Changed From isTouched to justTouched
message:
Changed From isTouched to justTouched

~ Changed input from using isTouched to justTouched. Now if the user is
dragging over a button it won't be activated. Only if it's the first
thing they touch

title: Added Character Descriptions & Paused Back Button
message:
Added Character Descriptions & Paused Back Button

+ Added small character bio below each character name on podium to give
them a bit of personality :)
+ Added a back button on the pause menu to return to the title screen
without dying

title: Added Play Button on Character Select
message:
Added Play Button on Character Select

+ Added play button on character select screen

title: Main Menu Bug Fix
message:
Main Menu Bug Fix

~ Fixed a bug in the main menu where tapping a button before it's
appeared will activate the button

title: Select Sound
message:
Select Sound

+ Select sound plays whenever a menu selection is pressed

title: Bug Fixes & Back Button
message:
Bug Fixes & Back Button

~ Clicking doesn't carry through screens now
~ Changed the back button to look more like a back button
~ Swapped placement of back button and restart button

title: Back Button
message:
Back Button

+ Added back button
+ You can now return to the main menu from the game or character
selection screens

title: Implemented Character Selection
message:
Implemented Character Selection

+ Character selection button on main menu
+ Character selection screen
+ Ability to choose new character in selection screen
+ Characters on podiums on selection screen
+ Animation plays when different character selected
+ Selected character now saved to preferences and then is the default
character
+ Default character is now the character on menu screen
+ Default character is now the player character on game screen
~ Nikola class renamed to Player

title: Improved Background + New Character
message:
Improved Background + New Character

+ Added new character sprite and animations
~ Improved the background to make it fit the theme of the game more
closely

title: Added Parallax Scrolling Background
message:
Added Parallax Scrolling Background

+ Added parallax scrolling background
- Removed parallax scrolling background. Mountain didn't fit the theme.
Need to extend the floor upwards and draw rock structures instead.

title: Started Background Details
message: Started Background Details

title: Finished Pause Function
message:
Finished Pause Function

~ Moved updating to an update method in each class instead of being in
the render method

title: Started Pause Capability
message:
Started Pause Capability

+ Added pause asset
+ Started pause code

title: Fixed Scaling
message:
Fixed Scaling

- Removed render method from all sub-cacti improving performance
~ Removed scaling system in favour of a better solution. Now using
LibGDX viewport to letterbox the screen if resolution is incorrect
~ Elements now relatively smaller on screen (accidental improvement)

title: Finished Title
message:
Finished Title

+ Added start button that fades in with the title sequence (can be
skipped by tapping)
~ Title animation process finished
~ Changed restart button to the new start button
~ Noticed that the pixel conversion system keeps the aspect ratio of
computer resulting in stretched graphics. Need to adjust to match the
aspect ratio of the character

title: Pixel to Screen Size Conversion + Title Screen
message:
Pixel to Screen Size Conversion + Title Screen

+ System to convert pixels to the appropriate location on the screen
(was stupid to not have this before!)
+ Skipping title sequence now works on mobile instead of just desktop
~ Title screen adjustments
~ Clouds move a little slower

title: Continued Main Menu
message:
Continued Main Menu

+Character's face now scrolls up from the bottom animated
+ When character's face arrives at end position title fades in
+ If user doesn't want to wait they can tap to skip sequence

title: Cleanup and Started Main Menu
message: Cleanup and Started Main Menu

title: Added Sound Effects And High Score Saving
message:
Added Sound Effects And High Score Saving

+Sounds effects for jumping, colliding, scoring and selecting
+High score now recorded and presented at the end of the game
~Character no longer jumps when restart button is pressed

title: Added End Game Dialog Fade
message:
Added End Game Dialog Fade

End game dialog box now fades in. You can't restart the game until box
is completely faded in.

message: Re-added Jumping Animations

Jumping System Fixed

Character now jumps same relative distance from jump independent of
speed

title: Improved Jumping System
message:
Improved Jumping System

Dramatically reduced the size of the jumping code. Allowing adjustments
to be made to the jump distance as the game speed increases, making it
possible to get further than a certain value
